extendedInfo.description: *Over 1 Million Downloads*Can you help the birds find his destiny? Use the on screen control to jump. Be careful the bombs!Each challenging level requires logic and skill to solveFun, little yet addictiveNow have 70 levelsby Andrew (March 10, 2011)Awesome game! 1 of my favorite games!by Lacey (March 1, 2011)Awesome game but level 29 was super tricky!by sean (February 27, 2011)Not easy but one of the top 10 highly rocomendby Haley (February 21, 2011)Verry addciting! && hard! More levels pleasee!!by Katie (February 20, 2011)I love lovee lovee this game!! :) I beat all the levels, and cant wait for more updates!by Anabel (February 20, 2011)The best game everby jerica (January 29, 2011)Very addicting game. So fun and challenging. I love this game! Def one of my favesby Veronica (January 16, 2011)I love this game. Crazy bird is cute and has good levels :)

reviews.title: More levels
reviews.comment: Lvl 73: you can get the yellow one in the end if you let the red one near her for the end... (you take the yellow group in the left with the last one red -- the one that changes into green sometimes)  Lvl 62: 4r 2u 5l  1d 2r 2d 2l  1d 2r  2d 1u 1r 2d 1r 1u  1r 1u 1r 1u 1r 3u  1r 1u 1r 4d 1u 1l I sincerly expected more difficulties... it needs more levels because after the congratulations, the charme is over...
reviews.author: LadyCostinna

reviews.title: Brain teasing
reviews.comment: Simple concept which gets you thinking. Cute bird.

reviews.comment: got stuck on 46 for a bit and passed it but now I am stuck on 73 for 3 days ! How do I get the yellow one in front of the arrow ?

reviews.title: Fun puzzle game
reviews.comment: Very simple design but fun and addicting. Perfect way to unwind after day at the office. You can play with one hand, which is key on the NYC subway.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but get read of the buttons
reviews.comment: The game is cool and enjoyable, but buttons on the screen is old fashioned, give the freedom to swipe anywhere on the screen or taps where we want the bird to jump to.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Just don\'t get how some people comment that this game is too easy -_-\nI don\'t think #40 can be done, btw!

reviews.title: Level 35!
reviews.comment: Took me a few days...just ignore the #9 bomb! Geez!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FINISHED!!! ^_^ *Does a dance*
reviews.comment: Yay! I have a ridiculous sense of accomplishment now I\'ve finally got through level 75. lol ^_^ Man I was flying through the game until I smacked into that Level like a brick wall. hehe Love the game, big thanks to the developers. If anyone is TRULY STUCK (like you\'ve been on the same board for a week) you can contact me on YouTube email, user name \"thepinkbinks\". I\'ve written a walkthrough. This is a temporary offer so don\'t flood me with emails if you\'ve only tried it for a few hours. x
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So addictive!
reviews.comment: Crazy Bird is really addictive! When I wait on my ride home, I\'ll get my phone out and start playing Crazy Bird!

reviews.comment: Loved it, but I\'ve been on level 31 for a week...so its a little frustrating at this point.
